title: Pitta pizzas
description: Pitta breads make a quick base for these pizzas. Freeze the breads and the sauce in ice-cube trays so you can whip up a pizza in ten minutes.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you need a hand-held blender to make the tomato sauce.
ingredients: 2 tbsp mlld olive oil or sunflower oil
1 red pepper, stalk removed, seeds removed, thinly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
